perturbation.original_text: HPIL ET shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless GINARES  from, against and with respect to any claim, liability, obligations, loss, damage, assessment, judgment, cost and expense (including, without limitation, reasonable attorneys' and accountants' fees and costs and expenses reasonably incurred in investigating, preparing, defending against or prosecuting any litigation or claim, action, suit, proceeding or demand) or any kind or character (collectively, "Losses") arising out of or in any manner, incident, relating or attributable to: any inaccuracy in any representation or breach of warranty of GINARES contained in this Agreement and (ii) any failure by HPIL ET to perform or observe, or to have performed or observed in full any covenant, agreement or condition to be performed or observed by HPIL ET under this Agreement or any of the other agreements or instruments executed and delivered by HPIL ET on the Closing Date.
perturbation.changed_text: HPIL ET shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless GINARES  from, against and with respect to any claim, liability, obligations, loss, damage, assessment, judgment, cost and expense (including, without limitation, reasonable attorneys' and accountants' fees and costs and expenses reasonably incurred in investigating, preparing, defending against or prosecuting any litigation or claim, action, suit, proceeding or demand) or any kind or character (collectively, "Expenditures") arising out of or in any manner, incident, relating or attributable to: any inaccuracy in any representation or breach of warranty of GINARES contained in this Agreement and (ii) any failure by HPIL ET to perform or observe, or to have performed or observed in full any covenant, agreement or condition to be performed or observed by HPIL ET under this Agreement or any of the other agreements or instruments executed and delivered by HPIL ET on the Closing Date.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Losses' is replaced with 'Expenditures' without defining 'Expenditures', creating ambiguity. It is uncertain whether 'Expenditures' is broader or narrower than 'Losses', leading to potential disputes over the scope of indemnity.

perturbation.original_text: GINARES shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless HPIL ET from, against and with respect to any claim, liability, obligations, loss, damage, assessment, judgment, cost and expense (including, without limitation, reasonable attorneys' and accountants' fees and costs and expenses reasonably incurred in investigating, preparing, defending against or prosecuting any litigation or claim, action, suit, proceeding or demand) or any kind or character (collectively, "Losses") arising out of or in any manner, incident, relating or attributable to: any inaccuracy in any representation or breach of warranty of HPIL ET contained in this Agreement and (ii) any failure by GINARES to perform or observe, or to have performed or observed, in full any covenant, agreement or condition to be performed or observed by GINARES under this Agreement or any of the other agreements or instruments executed and delivered by GINARES on the Closing Date.
perturbation.changed_text: GINARES shall reimburse, defend, and hold harmless HPIL ET from, against and with respect to any claim, liability, obligations, loss, damage, assessment, judgment, cost and expense (including, without limitation, reasonable attorneys' and accountants' fees and costs and expenses reasonably incurred in investigating, preparing, defending against or prosecuting any litigation or claim, action, suit, proceeding or demand) or any kind or character (collectively, "Damages") arising out of or in any manner, incident, relating or attributable to: any inaccuracy in any representation or breach of warranty of HPIL ET contained in this Agreement and (ii) any failure by GINARES to perform or observe, or to have performed or observed, in full any covenant, agreement or condition to be performed or observed by GINARES under this Agreement or any of the other agreements or instruments executed and delivered by GINARES on the Closing Date.
perturbation.explanation: Here, "indemnify" is changed to "reimburse," and the defined term "Losses" is changed to "Damages".  While these terms have related meanings, they aren't precise synonyms, and no definition of "Damages" is provided creating confusion about what is covered and how it is calculated.

perturbation.original_text: All notices and other communications required or permitted hereunder shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been duly given (a) when delivered in person, (b) five (5) business days after being sent by registered or certified mail, return receipt requested, postage prepaid, (c) when dispatched by electronic facsimile transmission (with confirmation of successful transmission), or (d) one (1) business day after having been dispatched by an internationally recognized overnight courier service, in each case to the appropriate Party at the address or facsimile number specified below:
perturbation.changed_text: All notifications and other correspondences required or permitted hereunder shall be in writing and shall be considered to have been duly given (a) when delivered in person, (b) seven (7) business days after being sent by registered mail, return receipt requested, postage prepaid, (c) when dispatched by electronic facsimile transmission (with confirmation of successful transmission), or (d) one (1) business day after having been dispatched by an internationally recognized courier service, in each case to the appropriate Party at the address or facsimile number specified below:
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'notices' and 'communications' are changed to 'notifications' and 'correspondences' respectively and the delivery time by mail is changed from 5 to 7 business days, creating ambiguity and conflicting obligations about how and when effective communication between parties is established.
